account.description: The Account Settings provides a centralized vue to manage personal information, access cabinet, and oversee linked bank accounts.

system.description: The System Settings page provides a centralized interface for administrators to configure and manage essential system settings.

user_management.description: Manage user accounts, roles, and permissions effortlessly to ensure secure and efficient access control.

bank_account.card_description: This section allows users to efficiently manage bank accounts by performing the key actions related to saved bank accounts

hints.create_dialog_hint: Enter the details to create a new bank account. Make sure all the required fields are filled before saving.
hints.update_dialog_hint: Enter the details to update the bank account. Make sure all the required fields are filled before saving.

bank_account.promote_prompt: Are you sure you want to promote '<label>{{label}}</label>' as your main account?

default_condition.action_edit_failure: Error while altering the default conditions
default_condition.card_description: This section allows users to efficiently manage default conditions by performing the key actions related to saved conditions
default_condition.not_set: There are no default conditions set. Please configure them in the settings menu.

activity.card_description: This section allows users to efficiently manage activities by performing the key actions related to saved activities

sequence.card_description: This section allows users to efficiently manage sequences by performing the key actions related to predefined sequences
sequence.title: Configuring the numbering sequence

payment_condition.card_description: This section allows users to efficiently manage payment conditions by performing the key actions related to saved conditions

withholding.card_description: This section allows users to efficiently manage tax witholding by performing the key actions related to saved taxes

tax.card_description: This section allows users to efficiently manage taxes by performing the key actions related to saved taxes

users.description: View, manage, and customize user accounts to streamline access and ensure security.

hints.create_dialog_hint: Enter the details to create a new user. Make sure all the required fields are filled before saving.
hints.update_dialog_hint: Enter the details to update the user. Make sure all the required fields are filled before saving.
hints.activate_dialog_hint: This action will reactivate the user and restore their associated roles and permissions. Ensure this action aligns with your intended changes
hints.deactivate_dialog_hint: This action is irreversible and permanent. Deactivating the user will remove all associated roles and connections, affecting their access and permissions. Please proceed with caution.
hints.update_password_hint: Check this option if you want to change {{name}} {{surname}}'s password

users.require_password_hint: Users will be prompted to update their password on their next login.

roles.description: Define and assign roles to streamline permissions and access control for users.

hints.create_dialog_hint: Enter the details to create a new role. Make sure all the required fields are filled before saving.
hints.update_dialog_hint: Enter the details to update the role. Make sure all the required fields are filled before saving.
hints.delete_dialog_hint: This action is permanent and cannot be undone. All associations with this role will also be removed.
hints.duplicate_dialog_hint: This action will duplicate the role, including all its associations. You can undo this action later if needed.

permissions.description: Set and manage permissions to control access to features and resources securely and efficiently.
